spans.text: Perhaps worried about the biting night wind, or perhaps not wanting to make the person in the back seat too nervous, Umiri didn't drive very fast on the way back.
Therefore, by the time Taki got home, it was already late at night, and there was naturally no progress on the song.
——Because as long as she closed her eyes, the faint sound of the waves would ring in her heart, taking away her anxiety and unease.
Being alone all night did not help the song's progress, because almost every minute new distracting thoughts popped up in her mind.
Those were the topics she had originally planned to share while drinking, but which had been silenced by her unthinking refusal.
Taki Shiina never regrets her decisions, but for a moment—she found that she actually really wanted to know that destination.
